title: Lancer - Second Storm 2015 320 ak6103
description:
"We're very proud to finally launch the 'Second Storm.' Right now I'm on a train on my way to Karlstad, Sweden for the final rehearsals before our release shows. When I listen to our new album, I become more and more convinced that our music will fill a gap in the heavy metal market. This is an honest and cheerful version of the music that we love.

"Our passion and hunger for music shines throughout every minute of this album. An album filled with soaring vocal melodies, thundering drums, splendid guitar work and pounding bass. The production takes this '80s inspired metal songs into 2015 without losing the grip of the traditional heavy metal sound, with the melodies and speed from Germany, performed by five metal heads from Sweden. Hold on tight, the storm has arrived!"
